RoomOfDemon.NAME: Evil Room
DESCRIPTIONS: You find a room with a lot of burning #ytorches, you can feel a unknown breath there. NL You want to leave, but the door is @closed@ @heavily@ , you scrutinize this room. NL Only find a #yparchment with a #ycross pining it on the floor...

You look attentively at this #yparchment, some #rblood words emerge: NL  #r@Ph'nglui.mglw'nafh.Remilia.D'mansion.wgah'nagl.fhtagn@  NL At this moment, ALL #ytorches in this room are extinguished... NL  ~On~ ~this~ ~parchment...~ ~a~ ~askew~ ~triangle~ ~emerge~
You pull out the #ycross, this moment the door is @heavily@ opened. You run out in hash.
You can feel a #p~cold~ #p~hint~ in back, you find door was opened after turn round. NL So you leave immediately.

RoomOfTime.NAME: Graceful Room
DESCRIPTIONS: You walk into a delicately ornamented room. But it is covered with dust, seems like there is a long time nobody using it. NL You didn't find anything helpful, but a #ynotebook and a #ypocket #ywatch in a desk drawer.
你来到一间装饰精致的房间,从被擦去的灰尘可以看出 ~不久前有人搜索过这里...~  NL 你没有翻到什么有用的东西,只在一个柜子中发现了一本 #y笔记本 和一只 #y怀表 .

You leaf through this thick and heavy #ynotebook. There is full of ~good~ ~memories~. NL At the last page of this book, has something you can't understand with @messy@ @handwriting@... NL And there has #b2 Cards...

You leaf through this thick and heavy #ynotebook. There is full of ~good~ ~memories~. NL At the last page of this book, write with @messy@ @handwriting@:  #b@I'm@ #b@so@ #b@sorry@ #b@for@ #b@can't@ #b@accompany@ #b@you@ #b@till@ #b@the@ #b@last...@   NL And there has #b2 Cards...
You leaf through this thick and heavy #ynotebook. There is no word in it... NL Only has #b2 Cards at the last page...

You leaf through this thick and heavy #ynotebook. There is no word in it... NL Only at the last page, write with #rscarlet #rblood: #rI #rhad #ralready #rsee #rthis #rday's #rcome...  NL And there has #b2 Cards...
You screw the #ypocket #ywatch, it start to #b~ticked~ #b~down~. NL You surprised for that it can still work. At the same time you find, the hands of this watch ~move~ ~anticlockwise...~
You feel @dazed@. You find you are on the path before when sobered up. And your wound recovery partly...
You feel @dazed@. You find you are on the path before when sobered up. And with that #ypocket #ywatch in your hand ...
You feel @dazed@. You find room is disappear when sobered up, and you are standing where you entered that room...
You feel a #p@Violent@ #p@dizziness@. You find room is disappear when sobered up, and you are standing where you entered that room...
You decide to leave without take anything...
You decide to leave without take anything. You believe it's a right decision.

SpiritSuffering.NAME: Spirit Suffering
DESCRIPTIONS: You feel you are be ~stared~ ~at~ by something. Then the #p@terrible@  ~memories~ what you never want to remember ~arise~ ~in~ ~your~ ~mind...~
You feel very #p@bad@ , you don't want to face it. That makes you, ~feel ~better,~ ~feel~ ~nothing...~
You survived this, but still has #p~dark~ #p~clouds~ shroud your mind. It also steel you, makes you fill with #g@determination@ !

Ferry.NAME: Ferry
DESCRIPTIONS: You are stopped by a wide #briver(?) that even can't see the the other side. NL You search for a long time, only find 1 boat. NL There is a person with #b~a~ #b~clock~ #b~and~ #b~a~ #b~huge~ #b~sickle~ stand on the boat.

You ask her for river crossing, NL "You are not the object of my serivice" NL "But it's #p~unusual~ #p~time~ now, only need #r@ALL@ of your #yGold. NL Then you can cross the river!" NL What do you decide to do?
She signals you to embark. After a while, NL she asks in a sudden: "Your combat there, it's for what?"
She signals you to embark. This river is not so wide as it seems. NL You attain the opposite shore soon.
"So, there's no way out." , she signals you to embark. NL ...A long time passed, you still cannot see the opposite shore. You feel #p~Exhaustion~ of body and mind ~...~

"Maybe I can help you" NL Then she @swings@ @to@ @you@ with her #rsickle, you are so scarded that close your eye... NL You find you attain the opposite shore after opening your eye, and you feel #gglow #gwith #genergy .
"A 'amusing' reason" NL Then she rummages on the boat, and take out #ysomething, "Take them."
You take them in your bag, you find you attain the opposite shore when look up.
" @Hahahahahaha@ " NL she laughs out loudly. Boat attain the opposite shore soon. NL When you about to leave, She presses #ysomething to you, "Give my regards to his nibs" NL You leave with doubt.
She silent for a while. NL "The #pend of everthing, is the new #gbeginning ..." NL Boat attain the opposite shore soon...
"Sorry, I have nothing to talk with you" NL Boat attain the opposite shore soon...
She #r@beats@ you in a sudden. You was got to sleep, then find you attained the opposite shore.

GateofTheMinistry.NAME: Gate
DESCRIPTIONS: You see a #ymagnificent door. When you #b~lightly touch~ the door. NL It #b~open~ #b~a~ #b~crack~ itself, just enough for you to walk in...
You think it's #pnot #pin #pharmony, so decide to #bignore it.

Kourindou.NAME: Mysterious Shop
DESCRIPTIONS: You enter a Mysterious Shop, it crammed with #b~peculiar~ object. NL A man with bizarre attire accost you from shadow: NL " #yWhat you want to gain, and #rwhat you could give?" NL NL It seems like you can change #ysomething with him.
He take the #yGold," #yThese would be useful to you.", NL Then he rummages some #bpotions and #bcards.
He holds the card and looks it over carefully,"It's #binteresting .", NL Then takes out a #yRelic," ~A equitable deal.~ "
He holds the #yRelic ,"A
... #pshity thing..." NL Then takes out #b1 #yGold
#bcommon thing." NL Then takes out some #yGold .
#buncommon thing." NL Then takes out many #yGold .
#yrare treasure!" NL Then takes out a pile of #yGold .
#ymysterious treasure!" NL Then takes out a pile of #yGold .
#ypowerful treasure!" NL Then takes out a great pile of #yGold .
," #yIt just deserve."
You take his things.

When see this #bspoon, he catches his breath. Then rummages a #pantiquated #bbook. NL He seems @endures@ @something@. But without ~any~ ~word~, just pass the #bbook on to you. NL You don't have the nerve to ask more...
"It seems we have nothing to talk."
